title: Lotte Kopecky Uncorks Huge Sprint to Win Paris-Roubaix Femmes
content:
World champion denies Balsamo and Georgi in the velodrome to make perfect comeback from disappointment at Tour of Flanders.

Read the full article at Lotte Kopecky Uncorks Huge Sprint to Win Paris-Roubaix Femmes on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
